message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $170.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the opportunity, but $170 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.  What do you think?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $155. It's a fair price considering its value, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this amazing item.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $155 is still a little more than I'm able to spend right now. I'm willing to go up to $140.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer the product to you for $150. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
